title: 'The Second Coming of the KKK'
description: Linda Gordon talks about “The Second Coming of the KKK”; Scott Kelly discusses “Endurance: A Year in Space, a Lifetime of Discovery”; and editors from the Book Review talk about our 10 Best Books of 2017.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
